version_description:
- Resolved an issue that prevented the edition of chord properties under certain conditions on iPad.
- Changes are now instantly applied when editing chord properties.

- Resolved an issue that prevented the edition of chord properties under certain conditions on iPad.
- Changes are now instantly applied when editing chord properties.

- Added support for Audio Unit (AUv3).
- Resolved an issue with the detection of the in-app purchase in some situations.

- Added support for Audio Unit (AUv3).
- Resolved an issue with the detection of the in-app purchase in some situations.

- pads can now be triggered from the MIDI Input !
- added more UI options in the Audio Unit, such as the display of the piano
- the Audio Unit can now be used in GarageBand
- various bug fixes

- pads can now be triggered from the MIDI Input !
- added more UI options in the Audio Unit, such as the display of the piano
- the Audio Unit can now be used in GarageBand
- various bug fixes

- Added a new template : Scale Notes.
- MIDI input mappings are now displayed on the pads in Edit Mode.
- Resolved an issue that paused background MIDI processing when audio output is disabled.

- Added a new template : Scale Notes.
- MIDI input mappings are now displayed on the pads in Edit Mode.
- Resolved an issue that paused background MIDI processing when audio output is disabled.

- Reorganized the Pad Set creation process.
- The volume for Chord Palette previews was increased.

- Reorganized the Pad Set creation process.
- The volume for Chord Palette previews was increased.
Chord inversions are now supported for all existing chord types!
Chord inversions are now supported for all existing chord types!
- the Pad Set Creation view can no longer be dismissed by accident in iOS 13.
- the Pad Set Creation view can no longer be dismissed by accident in iOS 13.
Stability improvements.
Stability improvements.

- Drag and drop can now be used between ChordPadX and Suggester.
- Pads and chords can be dragged into apps that support MIDI drag and drop.
- Improved the dark theme in iOS 13.
- Decommissioned the Free Trial.

- Drag and drop can now be used between ChordPadX and Suggester.
- Pads and chords can be dragged into apps that support MIDI drag and drop.
- Improved the dark theme in iOS 13.
- Decommissioned the Free Trial.
- Resolved an issue with the export of MIDI data.
- Resolved an issue with the export of MIDI data.

- The AudioUnit no longer requires to be restarted after the Full Unlock is detected.
- The AudioUnit can now take various sizes in GarageBand.
- Minor improvement to the UI.

- The AudioUnit no longer requires to be restarted after the Full Unlock is detected.
- The AudioUnit can now take various sizes in GarageBand.
- Minor improvement to the UI.

- The AudioUnit no longer requires to be restarted after the Full Unlock is detected.
- The AudioUnit can now take various sizes in GarageBand.
- Minor improvement to the UI.

- The AudioUnit no longer requires to be restarted after the Full Unlock is detected.
- The AudioUnit can now take various sizes in GarageBand.
- Minor improvement to the UI.

Improved audio stability when the audio route changes
Improved the drag and drop interactions with Suggester
Improved the in-app purchase experience

Improved audio stability when the audio route changes
Improved the drag and drop interactions with Suggester
Improved the in-app purchase experience
minor UI adjustments.
minor UI adjustments.

- resolved appearance issues in the AudioUnit
- minor UI improvements

- resolved appearance issues in the AudioUnit
- minor UI improvements
minor bugfix
minor bugfix

- resolved appearance issues with older versions of iOS
- minor UI improvements

- resolved appearance issues with older versions of iOS
- minor UI improvements
- stability improvements for older versions of iOS.
- stability improvements for older versions of iOS.

- Pads can now be labelled with a custom title.
- Added a new pad set template : Classic Chord Progressions.
- Resolved an audio issue when using the AudioUnit in AUM.
- Various UI improvements.

- Pads can now be labelled with a custom title.
- Added a new pad set template : Classic Chord Progressions.
- Resolved an audio issue when using the AudioUnit in AUM.
- Various UI improvements.

• Added drag and drop compatibility with the newly added custom chords in Suggester
• Improved the formatting of the chord name on pads
• Sixth chords are now notated 6 instead of add6
• Augmented chords are now notated + instead of aug
• Augmented 7th chords are now notated +7 instead of 7#5
• Diminished chords are now notated o instead of dim
• Half-diminished 7th chords are now notated ø7 instead of m7b5
• Monads are now notated 1 instead of a small note symbol
• 7#5b9 is now notated aug7b9
• 7#5b9 is now notated aug7#9

• Added drag and drop compatibility with the newly added custom chords in Suggester
• Improved the formatting of the chord name on pads
• Sixth chords are now notated 6 instead of add6
• Augmented chords are now notated + instead of aug
• Augmented 7th chords are now notated +7 instead of 7#5
• Diminished chords are now notated o instead of dim
• Half-diminished 7th chords are now notated ø7 instead of m7b5
• Monads are now notated 1 instead of a small note symbol
• 7#5b9 is now notated aug7b9
• 7#5b9 is now notated aug7#9
Resolved an issue that could cause stuck notes when used with certain synths.
Resolved an issue that could cause stuck notes when used with certain synths.

- Improved the handling of iCloud documents.
- Added feedback after successful store operations, such as restoring purchases.

- Improved the handling of iCloud documents.
- Added feedback after successful store operations, such as restoring purchases.

- Documents can now be created instantly.
- The color scheme has been improved.
- Added new instruments : Vintage Electric Piano and Organ.
